alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued January 23 at 12:27PM PST until January 24 at 8:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, north winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 55 mph. For the Frost Advisory, overnight temperatures between 32 and 36 degrees, resulting in frost formation in wind sheltered locations. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 4 PM PST this afternoon. For the Frost Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to 8 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. Take steps to protect outdoor pets.
info.instruction: Use caution if you must drive. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire
